meanings.definition: The ratio of the volume of red blood cells to the total volume of blood.
meanings.sent1: The hematocrit indicates how much space red blood cells take up in the blood.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use the hematocrit to check for anemia.
meanings.sent3: The hematocrit decided to throw a party for all the red blood cells.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like the hematocrit of life, essential and defining.
meanings.sent5: The hematocrit measurement is crucial for understanding blood health.

meanings.definition: A test to measure the hematocrit level in the blood.
meanings.sent1: After the accident, the doctor ordered a hematocrit to assess the blood loss.
meanings.sent2: The hematocrit test revealed that her levels were within the normal range.
meanings.sent3: The hematocrit test result made the patient jump for joy.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his health was evident in his regular hematocrit tests.
meanings.sent5: The hematocrit examination is a routine part of a blood check-up.
